Class SeedableRandomSingleton

java.lang.Object
  ca.ubc.cs.beta.random.SeedableRandomSingleton

public class SeedableRandomSingleton
extends java.lang.Object

Seedable Random number generator, subsequent calls to getRandom will return the same instance, this should allow predictable performance THIS CLASS IS NOT THREAD SAFE

seramage
